HCF9D1F76A49D409C9D00C3B2BB9D7F1A.text: Section 7431 of such title is amended—

H6E87582161DE4E06B64464F9336ED4D4.text: Section 7433 of such title is amended by striking “physicians and dentists” each place it appears and inserting “physicians, podiatrists, and dentists”.

source.xml:
<section identifier="/s1" id="HFF3314C8397B4F1B9AB9092FCF7909FC" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1">
	<num value="1">Section 1.</num>
	<heading> Clarification of grade and pay of podiatrists of the Department of Veterans Affairs</heading>
	<subsection identifier="/s1/b" id="H0814C694F08E424EB661D6505EA35377" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1">
		<num value="b">(b)</num>
		<heading> Pay.—</heading>
		<paragraph identifier="/s1/b/2" id="H6E87582161DE4E06B64464F9336ED4D4" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1">
			<num value="2">(2)</num>
			<heading> Administrative matters.—</heading>
			<content>Section 7433 of such title is amended by striking <quotedContent>“physicians and dentists”</quotedContent> each place it appears and inserting <quotedContent>“physicians, podiatrists, and dentists”</quotedContent>.</content>
		</paragraph>
	</subsection>
</section>
source.text: Section 7433 of such title is amended by striking “physicians and dentists” each place it appears and inserting “physicians, podiatrists, and dentists”.

execution.ampl: strike search("physicians and dentists")#all; insert "physicians, podiatrists, and dentists";

H2F0EBE4A8CFD43968E23EACBF89312CD.text: The heading of subchapter III of chapter 74 of such title is amended by inserting “, Podiatrists,” after “Physicians”.

	<subsection identifier="/s1/b" id="H0814C694F08E424EB661D6505EA35377" class="bill-dtd-OLC" pagenum="1">

H5D2E6025E80D4369AB96FE99D5459948.text: The table of sections at the beginning of chapter 74 of such title is amended by striking the item relating to subchapter III and inserting the following new item:

source.xml:
Section 1. Clarification of grade and pay of podiatrists of the Department of Veterans Affairs (b) Pay.— (4) Clerical amendment.—

The table of sections at the beginning of chapter 74 of such title is amended by striking the item relating to subchapter III and inserting the following new item:

“Subchapter III—Pay for Physicians, Podiatrists, and Dentists”.
